body_text:
I would prefer if the ReadOnly variants of the configs set CORS_ALLOW_METHODS = ['GET', 'OPTIONS'] (ie, only non-writing, idempotent methods). This is not strictly necessary, but it further hardens the API, and it presents more accurate information in Access-Control-Allow-Methods.
Generally, the read only servers don't have write access to the DBs, and the APIs don't allow any write methods. This is mostly a reflection of that current policy.
